department: Defence, Public Safety, and Emergency Preparedness
short_summary: To provide contract support for the design and procurement of $200,000 in southern Alberta, including $125,000 for CCSP (**Combined Cannabis Policy Continuum**), $75,000 for MDW (**Monitoring Drinking Water**), $50,000 for RC(**Red Cannabis Campaign), and $20,000 for C (_Cigs Alliance)**}.
